Template Function saturation_pressure_water¶

  • Defined in File physical_parameterizations.h

Function Documentation¶

template<class float_t>
float_t saturation_pressure_water(float_t T, float_t p_sat_low_temp, float_t p_sat_const_a, float_t T_sat_low_temp, float_t p_sat_const_b)¶

Saturation vapor pressure over a flat surface of liquid water in Pa. From ICON. Validity range: ?

Vanilla: From Murphy and Koop (2005). Validity range:

Return

Saturation vapor pressure

Parameters
